name: suburbia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the outer parts of a town, where there are houses, but no large shops, places of work, or places of entertainment: They live in a two-bedroomed house in the heart of suburbia.
the way of life of people who live in the outer parts of a town: He has written a book about middle-class suburbia.
